text: Adalia may refer to: ==People with the surname== * Khryss Adalia (1946–2008), Filipino film director ==Other uses== * The ancient name of Antalya, Turkey * "Adalia" (character), a fictional character in songs by Madina Lake * Adalia (genus), a genus of ladybirds in the family Coccinellidae ==See also== * Attalia (disambiguation)
title: Adalia
